name: Twingate-compatible Codespaces example (Service Account)
postStartCommand: sudo -E -- bash -c 'awk "{sub(/resolvconf/,//)}1" /etc/resolv.conf > /etc/resolv.conf.tg; cp /etc/resolv.conf.tg /etc/resolv.conf; /etc/init.d/dbus start; echo "$TWINGATE_SERVICE_KEY" | twingate setup --headless=-; twingate start'
